definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]

sentences.english: The genital tract mycoplasma infection is one of the sexually diseases.
sentences.chinese: 生殖道支原體感染是一種性傳播疾病。

sentences.english: Two common sexually transmitted infections are chlamydia and gonorrhea.
sentences.chinese: 兩種常見的性傳播感染是衣原體和支原體。

sentences.english: The Assembly adopted a draft strategy for the prevention and control of sexually transmitted infections (STIs).
sentences.chinese: 大會通過了預防和控制性傳播感染全球戰略草案。

sentences.english: Syphilis was the most feared of venereal diseases.
sentences.chinese: 梅毒是最讓人談虎色變的一種性傳播疾病。

sentences.english: The traditional method of diagnosing STIs is by laboratory tests.
sentences.chinese: 性傳播感染的傳統診斷方法是實驗室檢測。

sentences.english: Some sexually transmitted infections often exist without symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 一些性傳播感染往往沒有任何症狀。

sentences.english: The control of STIs remains a priority for WHO.
sentences.chinese: 控制性傳播感染仍是世衛組織的優先重點事項。

sentences.english: Some sexually transmitted infections exist without symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 一些性傳播感染沒有任何症狀。

sentences.english: Sexual dissemination is main spreading channel and also have the cases of transfusing blood infection.
sentences.chinese: 主要以性傳播爲主，也有輸血感染的病例。

sentences.english: Sexual transmission of Lassa virus has been reported.
sentences.chinese: 已有報道通過性傳播拉沙病毒。

sentences.english: Since the sexual transmission of real data are not statistics, the actual proportion is higher.
sentences.chinese: 由於經性傳播的真實數據無法統計，實際比例還要高。
